# EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Copper plate mine at position(x=41.0 y=-82.0)
Consists of following entities
-  Burner mining drill (position x=41.0 y=-82.0) and a furnace at position(y=-80.0)
-  Burner mining drill has status EntityStatus.NO_FUEL
-  Furnace has status EntityStatus.NO_FUEL

### Copper plate mine at position(x=60.0 y=-60.0)
Consists of following entities
-  Stone furnace (position x=60.0 y=-60.0) 
-  Furnace has status EntityStatus.NO_INGREDIENTS

### Offshore pump at position(x=106.5 y=-32.5)
Consists of following entities
-  Offshore pump (position x=106.5 y=-32.5) 
-  Offshore pump has status EntityStatus.WORKING

### Boiler at position(x=111.5 y=-32.0)
Consists of following entities
-  Boiler (position x=111.5 y=-32.0) 
-  Boiler has status EntityStatus.NO_FUEL

### Steam engine at position(x=117.5 y=-30.5)
Consists of following entities
-  Steam engine (position x=117.5 y=-30.5) 
-  Steam engine has status EntityStatus.NOT_CONNECTED

### Pipe group at position(x=107.5 y=-34.5)
Consists of following entities
-  Pipe group (position x=107.5 y=-34.5) 
-  Pipe group has status EntityStatus.EMPTY

### Pipe group at position(x=105.5 y=-32.5)
Consists of following entities
-  Pipe group (position x=105.5 y=-32.5) 
-  Pipe group has status EntityStatus.FULL_OUTPUT

### Electricity group at position(x=114.5 y=-28.666666666666668)
Consists of following entities
-  Electricity group (position x=114.5 y=-28.666666666666668) 
-  Electricity group has status EntityStatus.NOT_PLUGGED_IN_ELECTRIC_NETWORK

### Belt group at position(x=40.5 y=-83.5)
Consists of following entities
-  Belt group (position x=40.5 y=-83.5) 
-  Belt group has status EntityStatus.EMPTY

### Transport belt at position(x=63.5 y=-53.5)
Consists of following entities
-  Transport belt (position x=63.5 y=-53.5) 
-  Transport belt has status EntityStatus.WORKING

### Transport belt at position(x=64.5 y=-53.5)
Consists of following entities
-  Transport belt (position x=64.5 y=-53.5) 
-  Transport belt has status EntityStatus.WORKING

### Burner inserter at position(x=39.5 y=-79.5)
Consists of following entities
-  Burner inserter (position x=39.5 y=-79.5) 
-  Burner inserter has status EntityStatus.WAITING_FOR_SOURCE_ITEMS

### Burner inserter at position(x=41.5 y=-78.5)
Consists of following entities
-  Burner inserter (position x=41.5 y=-78.5) 
-  Burner inserter has status EntityStatus.NO_FUEL


# ERROR TIPS
### Errors when entities have no fuel
 -  Ensure that the entities have sufficient fuel to operate.
 -  Check the entity's status to determine if it is out of fuel.

### Errors when entities have no ingredients
 -  Ensure that the entities have the necessary ingredients to operate.
 -  Check the entity's status to determine if it is missing ingredients.

### Errors when entities are not connected
 -  Ensure that the entities are properly connected to the necessary networks.
 -  Check the entity's status to determine if it is not connected.

### Errors when pipe groups are empty
 -  Ensure that the pipe groups are filled with the necessary fluids.
 -  Check the pipe group's status to determine if it is empty.

### Errors when entities are not plugged into the electric network
 -  Ensure that the entities are properly plugged into the electric network.
 -  Check the entity's status to determine if it is not plugged in.

### Errors when belt groups are empty
 -  Ensure that the belt groups are filled with the necessary items.
 -  Check the belt group's status to determine if it is empty.

### Errors when burners have no fuel
 -  Ensure that the burners have sufficient fuel to operate.
 -  Check the burner's status to determine if it is out of fuel.
